name: Black Bracelets of Domination
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of kungfu'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'focus kungfu attacks'.
